branchCategory.name: LEJS, Electric Actuator, High Rigidity Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Motorless
branchCategory.description: <P>The LEJS is available in a motorless type, permitting the mounting of an AC servo motor other than the standard chosen by SMC.  Shaft coupling and mounting patterns are compatible with 8 servo motor series from 5 manufacturers.  Manufacturers include Mitsubishi, Yaskawa, Sanyo Denki, Omron and Panasonic.</P>

breadCrumb.name: LEJS, Electric Actuator, High Rigidity Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Motorless

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEF Series
